entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Whistler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whistler 06:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
